module TopModule (
    input logic [99:0] in,
    output logic out_and,
    output logic out_or,
    output logic out_xor
);

    assign out_and = ∈ // AND operation across all bits
    assign out_or = |in;  // OR operation across all bits
    assign out_xor = ^in; // XOR operation across all bits

endmodule
